problem_names: lemma sConjI: "\<lbrakk> \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P; \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> Q \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P \<and> Q"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<and> P \<tturnstile> false \<Longrightarrow>
    \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> \<not> P
lemma sConjI: "\<lbrakk> \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P; \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> Q \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P \<and> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P; \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> Q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P \<and> Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<and> P \<tturnstile> Q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<Gamma> \<tturnstile> P \<Rightarrow> Q
